    • Uses of Recipe in pl.myrecipebasket.repository

      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.repository that return Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Recipe RecipeRepository.findById(java.lang.Long id)
      This method finds in Recipe database table a record with id field equal to one provided as a parameter of this method and returns it as a Recipe object.
      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.repository that return types with arguments of type Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeRepository.findAllByIsShared(boolean isShared)
      This method finds in Recipe database table records with isShared field equal to the value provided as a parameter of this method and returns them as a list of Recipe objects.
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeRepository.findAllByUsrWhoAddedRecipe(User user)
      This method finds in Recipe database table records with usrWhoAddedRecipe field equal to one provided as a parameter of this method and returns them as a list of Recipe objects.
      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.repository with parameters of type Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vote VoteRepository.findByUserAndRecipe(User user, Recipe recipe)
      This method finds in Vote database table records with user and recipe fields equal to ones provided as a parameters of this method and returns it as a Vote object.

    • Uses of Recipe in pl.myrecipebasket.service

      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.service that return Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Recipe RecipeService.getRecipeById(java.lang.Long id)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database single Recipe object which id property equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.service that return types with arguments of type Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeService.getAllSharedRecipes()
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes.
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeService.getAllSharedRecipesWithinCategory(java.lang.String cName)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all shared Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter of this method.
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeService.getAllUsersRecipesWhithinCategory(java.lang.String cName, User user)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes that belong to Category which name equals to one provided as parameter to this method, and were added by particular User who also was a parameter of this method.
      java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeService.getRecipesAddedByUser(User user)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database all Recipes added by User provided as parameter of this method.
      Methods in pl.myrecipebasket.service with parameters of type Recipe 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void VoteService.addVote(java.lang.String voteType, Recipe recipe, User user)
      This method creates new Vote object and persists it in MyRecipeBasket database.
      int RecipeService.VoteComparator.compare(Recipe r1, Recipe r2) 
      Vote VoteService.getVoteByUserAndRecipe(User user, Recipe recipe)
      This method retrieves single Vote object that had been left by particular User and concerns specific Recipe
      void RecipeService.removeRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      This method removes Recipe from MyRecipeBasket database.
      void RecipeService.saveRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      This method persists Recipe object in MyRecipeBasket database
      void VoteService.updateVote(Vote vote, Recipe recipe, User user)
      This method updates VoteType of existing Vote and makes corresponding changes in UpVote & DownVote fields of the Recipe that the Vote considers.
